meanings.definition: A U.S. dollar earned through the sale of petroleum.
meanings.sent1: The petrodollar was used to purchase oil from overseas.
meanings.sent2: Countries often trade their oil for petrodollars.
meanings.sent3: The petrodollar went on a shopping spree for more oil.
meanings.sent4: The petrodollar flowed like liquid gold in the oil market.
meanings.sent5: The petrodollar symbolized the global oil trade.

meanings.definition: The currency earned by a country through the export of oil.
meanings.sent1: The petrodollar strengthened the economy of oil-producing nations.
meanings.sent2: Many nations rely on petrodollars for their economic stability.
meanings.sent3: The petrodollar threw a party to celebrate its value.
meanings.sent4: Petrodollars paved the way for economic growth in oil-rich countries.
meanings.sent5: The petrodollar sparkled brightly in the world of finance.
